text: Mimestoloides is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Mimestoloides. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Mimestoloides andresi Breuning, 1974 * Mimestoloides benardi Breuning, 1980 * Mimestoloides fasciatus Martins & Galileo, 2010 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Mimestoloides
